Long description: This bi-phase formula contains a superfood oil blend that feels nourishing and reveals more even-looking skin in 4 weeks*. This oil serum helps achieve a luminous glow instantly and over time, for a radiant complexion without or under makeup. This versatile formula can be used over entire face or on targeted areas, and before or in place of a moisturizer.

Name: Intensive WrinkleSpot Treatment
Product description: A dramatically effective multi-use spot treatment to visibly improve deep wrinkles & dark spots in just 4 weeks.*
Long description: This targeted spot treatment, with rapid Pure Retinol technology, delivers effective, proven results for smile lines, deep wrinkles, and dark spots.

Name: Intensive Firming Contour Serum
Product description: A luxurious anti-aging serum with instant firming benefits for face and neck. Features Enmei Herb Extract, our exclusive youth-prolonging ingredient.
Long description: This powerful firming serum transforms the face and neck areas with an age-defying duo of Enmei Herb and Licorice Extracts, quickly boosting skin’s regenerative powers for sculpted facial contours and supple, hydrated skin. Enhance lifting and toning effects with a daily facial massage.

Name: KOSHIRICE Acne Calming Spot Treatment
Product description: A gentle, alcohol-free acne treatment that reduces the look of blemishes in 1 week*.
Long description: This targeted treatment with Salicylic Acid helps reduce and prevent the appearances of blemishes, without drying skin. The cooling formula has a transparent finish that can be used under or over makeup.

Name: LiftDynamic Serum
Product description: Please Note: This product is being discontinued and will no longer be available once it sells out.A great replacement is our LiftDefine Radiance Serum, a powerful brightening serum for lifted, radiant skin.
Long description: This multi-benefit innovative sculpting serum supports skin’s natural restorative powers to help visibly lift and firm skin for youthful-looking density. With continued use, your skin appears youthfully tightened and looks more visibly sculpted. By helping restore elasticity and moisture, skin radiates with vitality.

Name: Legendary Enmei Ultimate Luminance Serum
Product description: A luxurious face serum that visibly improves skin.
Long description: This luxurious face serum is formulated from the Enmei herb, hand-picked from Japan's lush nature on tenshanichi, the most auspicious day of the Japanese calendar. Treasured Green Silk encourages the vitalizing forces that renew beautifully looking skin. A combination of traditional Japanese aesthetics, breakthrough technology, and ancient botanical wonders make this serum the most precious for improving skin quality.
